      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.servicebus.primitives that return RetryPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static RetryPolicy RetryPolicy.getDefault​()
      Retry policy that provides exponentially increasing retry intervals with each successive failure.
